title: Killing God - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Level System   Male Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Xiao Ding   萧鼎
description: Ten thousand years ago, the demon clan was overthrown by humankind, losing control over the Primordial Chaos World. The Primordial Chaos World remained peaceful and prosperous under the human clan's power while the other clans waited for the perfect moment to attack. With the fate of the world in a precarious balance, an ordinary young man is uprooted from his hometown and sets forth on a journey.>
